name: Stroke Once
description:
Stroke Once is based on a analog game named "Ghost Leg". When you choose one line from the choices, you need to follow the line and turn when a vertical line you will meet in the row.

The twist of this game is, you need to draw only one line to help yourself get point. Aside the choosing section, there will be some counts of puzzle is using those rule but having a new way to solve.

Control : Mouse only. Hold the left key and drag to stretch the line and release to finish the line.
